body.name: VIKEYUNVK Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth, 13000 Lumen Native 1080P Portable Projector with 200" Screen, Outdoor Projector Support ±30° Keystone Correction, Compatible with Phone/TV Stick/HDMI/USB
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 15 mins
features: 🌳 [Meet Your Use Needs] If you are looking for a portable projector with high brightness, eye protection, and easy to carry, then you must not miss the VIKEYUNVK outdoor projector. Our projector has a brightness of 13000 lumen, a native 1920*1080 resolution, and uses diffuse reflection technology to better protect eyes. Portable handheld design makes it the perfect companion for your outdoor camping trips

🌳 [Size Screen & ±30°Keystone Correction] VIKEYUNVK projector provide you with large-size screens of 30''-200''. The maximum screen size of 200'' will give you a super shocking viewing experience. The keystone correction function will help machine correct the screen tilt, obtain the best viewing angle

🌳 [Ultra-Fast WiFi & Bluetooth 5.2] Adopts the latest wifi connection function, is compatible with IOS, Android and Windows systems, and enjoys a low-latency same-screen experience (same-screen can also be achieved through cables). Bluetooth 5.2 brings lower latency and stable connection with bluetooth speakers, bluetooth headphone and other devices

🌳 [Broad Compatibility] VIKEYUNVK mini projector is equipped with multiple ports, such as 2 USB, HDMI, 3.5mm audio interfaces, and can be easily connected to TV stick/Chrome Book/laptop/DVD player/PS4/PS5/TV box/X-Box/PC, etc. ( Note: Due to HDCP copyright issues, Netflix/Disney/Hulu prohibits playing movies directly from the projector, please use a TV stick to play)

🌳 [Customers are Always Right ! !] We comes with a 3-year warranty, a 2-year no-questions-asked money-back guarantee and lifetime worry-free user support. If you have any product issues, please feel free to contact us, VIKEYUNVK support team will respond within an hour and resolve the issue. In order to give customers a better experience, our projectors will undergo software upgrades from time to time. If you need a better experience, you can communicate with us at any time and we will provide

We want everyone to enjoy the projector Note: ● Due to HDCP copyright issues, Netflix/Hulu/Amazon Prime/Youtube are prohibited from playing directly from the projector, please use a TV stick (not included) to play ● In order to give customers a better experience, our projectors will undergo software upgrades from time to time. If you need a better experience, you can communicate with us at any time and we will provide you with an installation package for upgrade

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The remote control is required to access the menu items so make sure you have two AAA batteries.
reviews.reviewText: This Projector is so easy to set up and use. Just remove from the packaging box, install 2 AAA batteries into the remote control (batteries not included). Plug the power cord onto the projector and into a surge protected power source, aim the projector at a flat white wall or screen 6 to 11 feet away, within the focusing ability of the adjustable focusing lens and turn on the power switch on the top of the projector. You can read the options on the "screen" and use the remote control to choose input settings.10 minutes from opening the box and viewing your source image on the "screen" (Screen not included) via HDMI connection. (HDMI to HDMI cable included.) I used a USB-C to HDMI cable to connect my computer to the projector. You can use the Wi-Fi option to set up a connection to your network, which takes just a little more time. The remote uses infrared technology and so the remote must be pointed to one of the two receiving windows in the projector, one on the front and one on the back. (Don't try pointing at the Screen) The projector is best used in a dark room or at night unless you have a reflective screen. If you test out on white drapes like I did then you can expect a little distortion if the drapes have pleats. (Amazon has many screens to choose from.) The VIKEYUNVK projector is exceptionally bright for its compact size. You can use the headphone jack to access the HDMI sound or use a Bluetooth speaker. directly from the source like I did with a laptop. This is well worth the small investment, and I would rank with the higher priced projectors. It is very portable and has a leather carrying strap. The fan makes minimal noise when running and does not distract from the movie or video presentation. I will be buying more of these soon. Don't pass it up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent portable projector for travel and fun
reviews.reviewText: This little powerhouse of a project is feature rich, yet affordable. Within five minutes of plugging it in, I was wirelessly streaming video from my Windows 11 PC to the projector. After turning it on I focused the video using the small knob on the top of projector to make it nice and sharp. Then, after putting 2 AAA batteries in the remote, I found the settings menu to adjust the trapezoid setting to make it a perfect rectangle. While this no doubt would work fine using the HDMI port, I wanted to challenge it with wireless video. After connecting the projector to my WiFi, in Windows under "wireless display" it recognized the projector immediately as a mira cast device (see pic). Once that was done, I was able to have it as an extra display to play video anywhere in my house over the WiFi network. I'm looking forward to putting this through more paces, but based on what I've experienced so far, 5-stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bang for your Buck
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a decent quality projector that was affordable, but I didn’t want the cheapest and be disappointed with the quality of the picture. After looking at various of projectors that was listed, I found this model to be the best price for the picture quality. The specs that was posted was very competitive to those found on high end projectors. I found this projector to be very affordable, portable, and user-friendly, which exceeded my expectations. Bluetooth function is useful and receptive. Menu is simple to understand. The compact design and lightweight is definitely a perk, allowing for easy portability. The built-in speakers deliver clear and immersive sound. Good construction. Very happy with this purchase. Overall, the Vikeyunvk projector provides a top-notch cinematic experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this thig!
reviews.reviewText: Packs a big punch in a small package. I was very surprised at the quality and small size that this product offers! From packing to initial setup, it was a breeze! Great for outdoor fun and using for work presentations on the go. The wireless display function was absolutely flawless. Connected to my Windows 11 PC right away and I was off and going with video and sounbd wirelessly! Cannot wait for the summer here for movie nights in the backyard! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time I bought a projector, since it is affordable. I was impressed with the performance. It shows clear picture with large screen. The controls are easy to use. Easy to carry or mount on a tripod.I have paired a Bluetooth speaker and it sounds good. Very impressive performance than an expensive projector.
